comments.body:
ansible pull was designed to run from cron 'unattended', which also lets
you specify user, so most options that are interactive make little sense.

Indeed @mpdehaan mentioned this in issue #4945, and I understand that. I am just submitting this in response to his request to resubmit this pull request. But as mentioned there (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/4945#issuecomment-28751238), feel free to proceed as you wish.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +124,128 @@                      help='Module name used to check out repository.  '
                      'Default is %s.' % DEFAULT_REPO_TYPE)
    parser.add_option('-K', '--ask-sudo-pass', default=False, dest='ask_sudo_pass', action='store_true',
                      help='ask for sudo password')
    options, args = parser.parse_args(args)
